Error

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
200 = 200

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Info

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Info

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Info

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Info

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

'ar1Dot.above' (ID 1) = '0'.
'ar1Dot.below' (ID 2) = '0'.
'ar2Dot.above' (ID 3) = '0'.

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Error

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

hhea

hhea metrics does not match either sTypo metrics or usWin metrics.

One of them needs to match the 'hhea' metrics. Clipping may occur. Please investigate.

Error

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0020

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0020.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0x25CC

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0x25CC.

Error

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Pass

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag is True.

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the sTypo metrics and not usWin metrics the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be True.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag is True.

Error

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

fvar table

fvar table

Info

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

STAT

static font

More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Error

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

cmap

cmap(0, 3, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni0000 is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Name Table

Name Table

Error

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '4'
'Mada'

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Semi, Ex, Demi, Sm, Dm, Extra, Ultra, Xtra, X'

Pass

name/OS/2

'Mada'

Error

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Mac NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'ExtraLight'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Mada ExtraLight' = NID 1 'Mada' + 'space' + NID 2 'ExtraLight'

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.004' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.004'.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '15'
'Mada-ExtraLight'

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Mada-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Mada-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'ExtraLight'

Info

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

Error

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Mada ExtraLight'

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mada' + 'Space' + NID 17 'ExtraLight' = NID 1 'Mada ExtraLight'.

Pass

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'

Error

name

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Mada'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Mada ExtraLight'

Mac NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 2 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31.

OK: NID 4 length is '10'
'Mada Light'

Pass

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Mada Light' = NID 1 'Mada' + 'space' + NID 2 'Light'

Pass

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Mac NID 4

Should be camel case Full Font Name NID4

NID 4: OK. No camel case required.

name

Check style extentions Full Font Name NID4

NID 4 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Semi, Ex, Demi, Sm, Dm, Extra, Ultra, Xtra, X'

'Mada Light'

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '10'
'Mada-Light'

Pass

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Mada-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Mada-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Info

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

Error

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mada' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Mada Light'.

Pass

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'

Error

Mada Light Regular (Mada-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Mada'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Mada Light'

Error

name

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Light'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Regular'

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Semi, Ex, Demi, Sm, Dm, Extra, Ultra, Xtra, X'

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Mada'

Pass

name

OK: NID 2 is 'Regular'

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31.

OK: NID 4 length is '12'
'Mada Regular'

Warning

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

If NID 2 is 'Regular': Mac NID 4 = NID 1

NID 4 'Mada Regular' ≠ NID 1 'Mada'

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.004' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.004'.

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '12'
'Mada-Regular'

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Mada-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Mada-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Info

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

Error

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

'Mada'

Mada Regular (Mada-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'

Pass

Entries are the same.

MS is: 'Mada'

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Mac NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'Medium'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Pass

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31.

OK: NID 4 length is '11'
'Mada Medium'

Pass

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Mada Medium' = NID 1 'Mada' + 'space' + NID 2 'Medium'

Pass

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '11'
'Mada-Medium'

Pass

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Mada-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Mada-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

Error

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Mada Medium'

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mada' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Medium' = NID 1 'Mada Medium'.

Pass

Mada Medium Regular (Mada-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'

Error

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Mada'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Mada Medium'

Error

name

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Regular'

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Mada'

Error

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Mac NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'SemiBold'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 2 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 2 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31.

OK: NID 4 length is '13'
'Mada SemiBold'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Mada SemiBold' = NID 1 'Mada' + 'space' + NID 2 'SemiBold'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Should be camel case Full Font Name NID4

NID 4 contains correct campel case: 'SemiBold'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Check style extentions Full Font Name NID4

NID 4 contains correct campel case: 'Semi'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

'Mada SemiBold'

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.004' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.004'.

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '13'
'Mada-SemiBold'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Mada-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Mada-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'SemiBold'

Info

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

Error

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '13'
'Mada SemiBold'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mada' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold' = NID 1 'Mada SemiBold'.

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'

Error

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Mada'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Mada SemiBold'

Error

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'SemiBold'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Regular'

Pass

Mada SemiBold Regular (Mada-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 3

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '1.004;UKWN;Mada-SemiBold'
MS is: '1.004;UKWN;Mada-SemiBold'

Pass

MS is: 'Mada SemiBold'

License Text is present.

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '4'
'Mada'

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Semi, Ex, Demi, Sm, Dm, Extra, Ultra, Xtra, X'

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Mada'

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Mada Bold' = NID 1 'Mada' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.004' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.004'.

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '9'
'Mada-Bold'

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Mada-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Mada-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Info

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

Error

Mada Bold (Mada-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Semi, Ex, Demi, Sm, Dm, Extra, Ultra, Xtra, X'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Mada'

Error

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Mac NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'Black'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Pass

NID 2 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31.

OK: NID 4 length is '10'
'Mada Black'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Mada Black' = NID 1 'Mada' + 'space' + NID 2 'Black'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.004' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.004'.

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '10'
'Mada-Black'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Mada-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Mada-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Info

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

Error

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

'Mada Black'

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mada' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black' = NID 1 'Mada Black'.

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'
MS is: 'Copyright © 2015-2016 The Mada Project Authors, with Reserved Font Name "Source". Source is a trademark of Adobe Systems Incorporated in the United States and/or other countries.'

Error

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Mada'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Mada Black'

Error

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Black'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Regular'

Pass

Mada Black Regular (Mada-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 3

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '1.004;UKWN;Mada-Black'
MS is: '1.004;UKWN;Mada-Black'

Pass

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 14, License URL' (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

License URL is present.

Pass

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

kern/GPOS

kern

'kern' table and 'GPOS' kerning.

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

Mada ExtraLight Regular (Mada-ExtraLight.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.
